column1: #Text=Tarrlok says : " Avatar Korra has bravely answered the call to action .
#Text=Why have you failed to locate him ?
#Text=" Korra says : " You want to know why ?
#Text=Because Amon is hiding in the shadows like a coward .
#Text=Amon , I challenge you to a duel !
#Text=No task force , no chi blockers , just the two of us tonight at midnight on Avatar Aang Memorial Island .
#Text=Let 's cut to the chase and settle this thing , if you 're man enough to face me .
